Html:
like the subject said

"Any plans of supporting Windows Phone and Windows 8?"

 

I found another QRCode encoder for Windows Phone but I think your QrCode.NET seems fast in WPF, would you mind creating one for Windows Phone and Windows 8 too?

Will do. Going to get win 8 and dev environment next week or so. Once I check out latest graphic stuff should be able to craft for win8. Win phone 7.5, there already a version in issue tracker, I might improve it and put it out with win 8 version. 

 

Currently, Main generator should be working on any environment, only renderer and controller have to be specifically craft.
awesome! how was it now? I just noticed your reply. LOL

Been busy, also did SVG renderer while forgot about Win8 at end of last year. My bad. 

I will try to get my hand on it during this weekend and let you know as soon as possible.

First of all, wonderful work! It works like a charm!

I'm very interested too in a Windows Phone 7 or 8 version of your project.

Thank you very much!
Just finished WinRT encoding and custom control, just have to work a bit more on renderer, then winRT port should be finished. Hopefully I can push newest change next weekend.

Hi,

Great lib. Any support for Windows Phone 8?
Not at moment. If you are in hurry, then just use silverlight source code, it probably only need to change few using reference.
